conbody.p: Users can access editing functions using the editing menu. It is opened by a short press of the star (*) key (or by pressing the Edit key on some devices) when in a text editor. The editing menu looks and functions like the Options menu, but it contains only text editing functions, whereas other available options remain accessible from the Options menu. The following table describes the options in the editing menu.

note.p: Only items that apply to the editor in use appear in the menu.

note.p: Some devices may offer more advanced text input methods and editing options.
